## Utils.optional() function

Verify that a variable is undefined or of a given type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function optional<T>(arg: T, name: string, type?: new (...args: any[]) => any): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  arg | T | the argument to verify |
|  name | string | a descriptive name of <code>arg</code> |
|  type | new (...args: any\[\]) =&gt; any | _(Optional)_ if <code>arg</code> is defined, verify that <code>arg</code> is an instanceof this type |

**Returns:**

T

the passed in `arg` value
